text: @SenateGOP @McConnellPress Those enhance Tax deductability business expenses. Yeah, 3 Martini lunches again.  What is you plan for vaccines? Force the FDA to approve an unproven vaccines.  Donny has yet to provide a  plan to do anything about covid19.  I so remember your BS about Ebola.
